root_sidebar.summary: Learn how to download and install Pulsar.
Get acquainted with the editor and its text-editing features.
Learn about Pulsar’s built-in packages and features like code-folding, syntax highlighting, snippets, and GitHub integration.
Learn about how to customize Pulsar’s keybindings, per-language settings, and styles.
Read specific tutorials for creating a community package or theme.
Learn about advanced topics relating to package development.
Learn how to contribute to Pulsar — to build the application from source and contribute feature additions and bug fixes.
I have no idea what to write about this section; I think it should be combined with a different section.
Learn how to troubleshoot Pulsar if things go sideways.
Learn about the tools used by the Pulsar team to deliver your favorite editor to you.
Read reference documentation for the API available to packages and to your init file.
